10/10 The French way of pronouncing "bubble" is awesome. @clemnt
9/10 People want to use @slack for everything. cc @getbirdly
8/10 tech and a long-term competitive advantage by leveraging the Big Data in your app (sorry for the buzzword)
7/10 The table stakes continue to rise (yours truly). Try to get a short-term competitive advantage by using cutting edge sales & marketing
6/10 Attribute MRR back to specific marketing channels/campaigns ... ask @nick_franklin if you need help.
5/10 As a EU startup, consider hiring an SF-based PR person to get on the map in the US. cc @bime_rachel
4/10 Don't look at signup-to-paid conversion rate on a monthly basis only. Take a cohort view at 30/45/60 day conversion cc @nick_franklin
3/10 You can build a great SaaS business out of Montpellier & Kansas City. :) cc @BIME_Rachel

8/8 Do you agree?
7/8 Oh and the fourth P is PRAYING, that's for the angels / early-seed.
6/8 Series A is in between Seed and B. Series C is in between B and D.
5/8 Series D: Hard to win a deal with a brand at this stage, you just have to PAY.
4/8 let's say "convince" but I needed another "P"!)
3/8 Series B: Now the winners look like winners but everyone wants to invest. So VCs need to PERSUADE with their brand, team, value-add (or
2/8 Seed: It's all about PICKING the right ones ... among 1000s of companies, none of which looks like a clear winner.
1/8 The 4 Ps of investing into the right companies.
